description: The folding sofa is very functional for you and your families. Releasing the back fatigue, it is a great seating for floor activities like playing games, reading and watching TV.  Firstly, it can be adjusted to between 0 degree to 90 degree ,you can choose the angle you want for comfort.  Secondly, as it have the zipper on the surfact, you can take apart the coral fleece fabric surface to wash, and it allows you to keep the sofa clean and you do not need to worry about how to deal with the dirty on the surface of the folding sofa.  Thirdly, when lay it flat on the floor,the sofa can be used as a soft and comfy cushion, when adjust other angles,you can sit on it like a chair. it seems like that you buy two goods instand of one thing. So in this way it can be considered to have two types of use.
